T02TD1504E:271a-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra sa ha dza tatta a'a lo ka / bod skad du /
T02TD1504E:271a-2: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba /
T02TD1504E:271a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1504E:271a-4: gang la brten nas rang rig bde chen po //
T02TD1504E:271a-5: stong dang snying rje dbyer med mtshon pa'i gzhi //
T02TD1504E:271a-6: chos dang longs sprul bde ba chen po yi //
T02TD1504E:271a-7: rang bzhin rtsa yi 'khor lo'i mgon btud nas ;
T02TD1504E:271a-8: /'khor lo bde mchog dpal rim las byung las //
T02TD1504E:271a-9: spyod 'chang mgon po'i zhal snga las rnyed pa'i //
T02TD1504E:271a-10: rang rig bde chen ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs //
T02TD1504E:271a-11: dpyid dang thig le bsgom pa'i man ngag bshad //
T02TD1504E:271a-12: bsam gtan khang pa rnam g-yeng skye bo yi //
T02TD1504E:271a-13: 'du 'dzi dang bral rnam par dpen pa'i sar //
T02TD1504E:271a-14: yongs su 'dzin pa ma lus rnam spangs te //
T02TD1504E:271a-15: mi g-yo rtse gcig ting 'dzin mchog bsgrub bya //
T02TD1504E:271a-16: bde ba'i stan gnas rdo rje skyil klung dang //
T02TD1504E:271a-17: lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya can //
T02TD1504E:271a-18: lus bsrangs nas ni mgrin pa dgug pa dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-0: mig @271b gnyis sna yi rtse mor mnyam sbyar zhing //
T02TD1504E:271b-1: gang la rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-2: mtshan dang dpe byad ma lus yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1504E:271b-3: rang snang shes rab phag mo dang 'dus pa'i //
T02TD1504E:271b-4: gnyis med bde ba'i rang bzhin rang lta'i sku //
T02TD1504E:271b-5: sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-6: bar ma'i srid dang chu zla lta bu yi //
T02TD1504E:271b-7: lus kyi dbus gnas sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi //
T02TD1504E:271b-8: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-9: spyan sogs rig ma bzhi yi bdag nyid dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-10: chos dang longs sprul bde ba che rang bzhin //
T02TD1504E:271b-11: ae bam ma y'a rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02TD1504E:271b-12: dbyangs dang gsal byed byang chub yi ger ldan //
T02TD1504E:271b-13: rdul dang snying stobs mun pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1504E:271b-14: rtsa gsum gyis ni yang dag sprel byas pa //
T02TD1504E:271b-15: yon tan skyon gyi rang bzhin rtsa gnyis la //
T02TD1504E:271b-16: brten nas steng dang 'og gi sgo gnyis nas //
T02TD1504E:271b-17: 'byung dang 'jug pa srog dang rtsol ba yi //
T02TD1504E:271b-18: gang du mi g-yo rtse gcig gyur pa las //
T02TD1504E:271b-19: dang po ri dags sred bzhin snang ba dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-20: mchan gnyis pa dang du ba'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1504E:271b-21: gsum pa srin bu me khyer dang 'dra zhing //
T02TD1504E:271b-22: bzhi pa sgron ma 'bar ba lta bu dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-23: mtshan ma lnga pa rnam par ma brtags par //
T02TD1504E:271b-24: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu 'byung 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1504E:271b-25: de tshe gang du ye shes me 'bar pa //
T02TD1504E:271b-26: gsal ba glog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02TD1504E:271b-27: steng du 'phro bas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs shing //
T02TD1504E:271b-28: bde chen rang rig ye shes ster bar byed //
T02TD1504E:271b-29: gang la brtan nas skyes pa'i ye shes dang //
T02TD1504E:271b-30: rang rig las gzhan brjod par mi nus shing //
T02TD1504E:271b-31: dngos dang dngos med rtog pa las grol ba //
T02TD1504E:271b-32: bde chen de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1504E:271b-33: gang zhig skyes pas thog med 'khor ba nas //
T02TD1504E:271b-34: bsags pa'i sgrib pa ma lus kun spong ba //
T02TD1504E:271b-35: gnyis med ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1504E:271b-36: gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1504E:271b-37: rtog pa gang gis rtog pa kun gcod cing //
T02TD1504E:271b-38: sna tshogs snang ba'i dngos kun der mtshon pa //
T02TD1504E:271b-39: bde chen rang rig ye shes gcig pu ba //
T02TD1504E:271b-40: gnyis med rtogs pa'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1504E:271b-41: gang la bstod dang gang gis bstod pa dang //
T02TD1504E:272a-1: bstod cing phyag 'tshal dang bral ba //
T02TD1504E:272a-2: spros tshogs gdags pa'i mtha' las rab 'das pa'i //
T02TD1504E:272a-3: mnyam nyid de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1504E:272a-4: gang zhig goms pa mthar phyin pas //
T02TD1504E:272a-5: kun du rtog pa kun spong zhing //
T02TD1504E:272a-6: rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog / tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed //
T02TD1504E:272a-7: brtul zhugs sbyong 'chang bla med pa //
T02TD1504E:272a-8: 'bar ba'i gtso bo'i bka' drin las //
T02TD1504E:272a-9: rtog pa'i don gang 'dir bsdus pas //
T02TD1504E:272a-10: 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang thob shog / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba slob dpon chen po dpag med rdo rjes mdzad pa /
T02TD1504E:272a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa da'i pam ka ra rakshi ta dang /
T02TD1504E:272a-12: a'a ts'ar+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//
